main event: A military intelligence officer in Washington, D.C. observed a bright light object that maneuvered in the sky over Baltimore, Maryland for 2.5 seconds before shooting straight up and disappearing.
interesting points: The object was observed moving north-south and then performed a maneuver.
The object was described as a bright light.
After the maneuver, the object shot straight up and disappeared.
The sighting was reported by a military intelligence officer.
witnesses: military intelligence officer from Washington, D.C.
